page.title: 02A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I get up in the morning and go and see if my mum and dad are awake. Then I will go back to bed and read a book. In five minutes mummy comes in to my bedroom and tells me to get up and get dressed. When I have done that I will go downstairs and have my breakfast of Rice Crispies and two pieces of toast. After that I will go upstairs and wash my hands and face then I will brush my teeth then I will go downstairs and get my school bag ready for school. When I have got my bag ready for school I will ring Kirstie up to see how we are getting down to school. When I have talked to Kirstie I will brush my hair and then go to school. When I get to school I will wait in the playground until the bell goes. Then we will all go to Assembly.
